title: Login button unresponsive
description: Users report that clicking the login button does nothing.

title: Order confirmation not received
description: Customer did not get confirmation email after placing an order.

title: Report download fails
description: Excel report download stops midway and gives error.

title: App logout issue
description: User stays logged in even after pressing the logout button.

title: Profile picture not uploading
description: Uploading new profile picture shows success but image does not change.

title: Incorrect password reset email
description: Password reset email sent to wrong address for some users.

title: Session timeout too short
description: Users are logged out after only 2 minutes of inactivity.

title: Discount code not applying
description: Promo codes entered at checkout are not reducing the price.

title: Search function slow
description: Search results take too long to appear when querying large datasets.

title: Notifications not showing
description: Users do not receive notifications for new messages.
